{{title|1=operator=={{small|(std::extents)}}}}
{{cpp/container/mdspan/extents/navbar}}
{{ddcl|since=c++23|1=
template&lt; class OtherIndexType, std::size_t... OtherExtents &gt;
friend constexpr bool operator==(
    const extents&amp; lhs, const extents&lt;OtherIndexType, OtherExtents...&gt;&amp; rhs ) noexcept;
}}

Compares two {{tt|extents}}. Returns {{c/core|true}} if {{c|lhs.rank()}} equals {{c|rhs.rank()}} and {{c|lhs.extent(r)}} equals {{c|rhs.extent(r)}} for every rank index {{c|r}} of {{c|rhs}}; otherwise returns {{c/core|false}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|lhs, rhs|extents whose values to compare}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
{{c/core|true}} if the extents represented by {{c|lhs}} and {{c|rhs}} are equal, {{c/core|false}} otherwise
